aaaaaaahhhhh I typed like a bad ass long answer to everyone and didn't copy it and post it but like only 1/5 part showed up :((    damn it sorry 

SKINS ARE POSSIBLE SEE VID
ONLINE IS POSSIBLE TOO YOU NEED TO INSTALL/USE HAMACHI

for skins: 
1.go to HOME/library/application support/minecraft/bin
2.compress minecraft.jar
3.unzip minecraft.jar(.zip)
4.delete official minecraft.jar
5.rename "minecraft" folder to minecraft.jar (say add)

NOTE: from here you also can add mods n' stuff

6. go to mobs (inside the new minecraft.jar folder)
7. this are the skins, alter them to whatever you like :)
8. be creative :)

for texture packs: 1.see skins 
2.then alter the "terrain.png" for obviously the terrain skin
3.alter stuff inside "gui"
4.alter stuff inside "item"
5.alter stuff inside "misc"
6.alter stuff inside "terrain"
7.alter stuff inside "title" (splashes are yellow words bouncing up and down when u enter the menu)

NOTE: DON'T MAKE THE IMAGES BIGGER THAN THEY WHERE! OTHERWISE IT MIGHT BUG/LAG OR EVEN CRASH! -paint only on the on transparent pixels- (for example for the player skin: http://danielmcgraw.com/images/minecraft/minecraftskinwithhelm.png   )
